name: Evian Natural Spring Water
description: Pure natural spring water from the French Alps, offering a refreshing and clean taste.

name: Fiji Natural Artesian Water
description: Bottled from an underground artesian aquifer in Fiji, known for its soft and smooth taste.

name: Aquafina Purified Drinking Water
description: Purified drinking water with a clean and crisp taste, perfect for daily hydration.

name: Dasani Purified Water
description: Purified water enhanced with minerals for a fresh and pure taste.

name: Voss Still Water
